org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering

Class RendererFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering.RendererFactory

  • public final class RendererFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A Factory that creates renderer objects. All classes extending Renderer must be instantiated through RendererFactory. Forces the client to use Renderer rather than its subclasses.
    Since:
    2019-01-14, v0.5

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createFromEnum

        public static Renderer createFromEnum(RendererType type,
                                      RendererDetails details,
                                      Camera camera)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new renderer based on the type enum.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the renderer
        details - the details of the renderer
        camera - the camera that is used.
        Returns:
        a new Renderer instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - thrown if:

        • details not an instance of MultithreadedRendererDetails if declaring a sub-class of MultithreadedRendererDispatcher.
        • details is an instance of MultithreadedRendererDetails when creating a SingleThreadedRenderer
        • type is an invalid enum
